医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
中风幸存者的后向推力的隐藏斗争侧推是一种导致身体向一侧倾斜的临床病症，影响了大约一半的中风幸存者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-hidden-struggle-of-lateropulsion-in-中风-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-hidden-struggle-of-lateropulsion-in-中风-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4da3b81-2582-4495-a63b-93a4c82e1adc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 04:09:12 -0400 The hidden struggle of lateropulsion in stroke survivors
女医生可以改善患者的治疗效果新研究表明，由女医生治疗的患者死亡率和再入院率较低，女性患者比男性患者受益更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Female-physicians-may-offer-improved-patent-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Female-practicians-may-offer-improved-patent-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e988398a-f4de-4939-9c60-0cf6e20669dc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:58:31 -0400 Female physicians may offer improved patient outcomes
纵向多组学监测为早期胰腺癌诊断铺平道路同行评审的《OMICS：综合生物学杂志》上发表的一份新病例报告描述了纵向多组学监测 (LMOM) 如何帮助检测癌前胰腺肿瘤并导致成功的手术干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Longitudinal-multi-omics-monitoring-paves-the-way-for-early-pancreatic-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Longitudinal-multi-omics-monitoring-paves-the-way-for-early-pancreatic-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e5364dc-f50b-4076-bb60-3c7b0d220c3b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:23:42 -0400 Longitudinal multi-omics monitoring paves the way for early pancreatic cancer diagnosis
研究发现新冠病毒快速变异背后的隐藏机制引起新冠肺炎的 SARS-CoV-2 病毒具有经常产生自身变体的令人不安的能力。其他病毒也会发生变异，但随着 SARS-CoV-2 在大流行期间迅速在整个人类中传播，导致数百万人死亡，该病毒的动态进化带来了严重的问题：它反复挑战我们身体对抗病毒的免疫反应，阻碍了我们的免疫反应。准备更新疫苗的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Study-discovers-hidden-mechanism-behind-rapid-COVID-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Study-discovers-hidden-mechanism-behind-rapid-COVID-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b35bf62b-8d68-412a-9f07-4cf7ecd14703 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:12:23 -0400 Study discovers hidden mechanism behind rapid COVID variants
新技术通过智能手机追踪药物使用情况De Gruyter 的临床化学和实验医学发表的一项新研究首次揭示了一种从智能手机表面收集药物使用数据的简单便捷的方法。通过帮助临床医生了解人们在特定情况下服用的药物，该研究可以保护公众健康并改善疑似用药过量患者的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Smartphone-Swabs-Provide-Convenient-Toxicology-Testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Smartphone-Swabs-Provide-Convenient-Toxicology-Testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9733d67-e4f2-40ab-a699-99b83fa62565 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 03:03:00 -0400 New technique tracks drug use through smartphones
研究探索妈妈的肥胖如何重新编程婴儿越来越多的研究表明，当肥胖女性怀孕时，“胎儿重新编程”过程会增加她的宝宝在生命早期面临肥胖、2 型糖尿病和肝病等问题的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Researchers-Earn-2423-Million-Grant-To-Study-Generational-Cycle-Of-Maternal-Obesity-Liver-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Researchers-Earn-2423-Million-Grant-To-Study-Generational-Cycle-Of-Maternal-Obesity-Liver-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c0d22b0-91ce-4651-aa04-ec17b301c80f Tue, 23 Apr 2024 02:46:00 -0400 Research explores how moms' obesity reprograms babies
新工具在肠道微生物组中寻找阿尔茨海默病的线索克利夫兰诊所的研究人员正在利用人工智能来揭示肠道微生物组与阿尔茨海默病之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/New-tool-hunts-for-Alzheimers-clues-in-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/New-tool-hunts-for-Alzheimers-clues-in-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0e8eed5-87d1-4faa-be94-4b414159dc8b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 02:40:00 -0400 New tool hunts for Alzheimer's clues in gut microbiome
治疗联盟在迷幻治疗中的重要作用药物效应主导了全国有关迷幻药治疗的讨论，但一项新的研究表明，当谈到通过迷幻药辅助治疗减少抑郁症时，最重要的是治疗师和研究参与者之间的牢固关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-vital-role-of-therapeutic-alliances-in-psychedelic-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/The-vital-role-of-therapeutic-alliances-in-psychedelic-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c7d63c5-5d16-4fef-9fcc-9bf7a9ce8e9a Tue, 23 Apr 2024 02:17:00 -0400 The vital role of therapeutic alliances in psychedelic treatment
揭示社区药房如何帮助戒烟工作一项新的研究表明，社区药店可能在帮助人们戒烟方面发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unveiling-how-community-pharmacies-aid-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unveiling-how-community-pharmacies-aid-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dff81e41-7883-4345-88a6-a1ac0e45bd84 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 02:09:40 -0400 Unveiling how community pharmacies aid smoking cessation efforts
Aster DM Healthcare 揭示了对抗 PCOS 症状的最佳食物2024 年 4 月，全球范围内与多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 相关的 Google 搜索量创下历史新高，表明人们对了解和管理这种疾病的关注和兴趣日益浓厚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Aster-DM-Healthcare-reveals-top-foods-to-combat-PCOS-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Aster-DM-Healthcare-reveals-top-foods-to-combat-PCOS-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f449aea-1903-4e20-9be8-4be55c8eb62b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 01:56:00 -0400 Aster DM Healthcare reveals top foods to combat PCOS symptoms
